block.field:
this script selects all project items
(in the project panel) which match the
given search text.

PARAMETERS:
----------- search in name -------------
searches for the search text in the name
of the item
---- search in metadata keywords -------
searches for the search text in the
"Dublin Core -> Keywords" XMP metadata
of the project items 
----- search in footage file path ------
for footage items: searches in the full
file path of the footage file
----- process only selected items ------
If this is enabled, the script does not
search in all project items, but only in
the ones that have been selected before
running the script.
------------- operation ----------------
if the found project items should 
replace the current selection or be 
added to or removed from it
------------ case sensitive ------------
Ignores upper/lower case differences in
the search
---------- regular expression ----------
Allows to enter regular expressions as
search text. These expressions allow to
search for complex patterns, can
restrict a search to only the beginning
or end of the text and much more. Google
for "regular expressions" to learn more.
replace existing selection|add to existing selection|remove from existing selection

right click->expand block
to see or change details
Processing all items can be slow on big projects. Do you want to continue?
found in footage path of item
